languages.text: {n}Солдаты молча взирают на вас, и в их жестких осуждающих взглядах нет ни капли раскаяния.{/n}
{n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Солдаты молча взирают на вас, и в их жестких осуждающих взглядах нет ни капли раскаяния.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los soldados te observan en silencio con ojos severos y críticos, sin ningún rastro de remordimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los soldados te observan en silencio con ojos severos y críticos, sin ningún rastro de remordimiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有士兵都以严厉的眼神盯着你，目光中毫无悔意，仿佛在审判你一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有士兵都以严厉的眼神盯着你，目光中毫无悔意，仿佛在审判你一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}兵士たちは、厳めしく、後悔の念のない、人を判断するような目で黙ってあなたをじっと見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}兵士たちは、厳めしく、後悔の念のない、人を判断するような目で黙ってあなたをじっと見る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les soldats vous fixent sans mot dire d'un regard dur et sans appel, entièrement dénué du moindre remords.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les soldats vous fixent sans mot dire d'un regard dur et sans appel, entièrement dénué du moindre remords.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Askerler, içinde hiçbir pişmanlık belirtisi olmayan sert, yargılayıcı gözlerle sessizce sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Askerler, içinde hiçbir pişmanlık belirtisi olmayan sert, yargılayıcı gözlerle sessizce sana bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Soldaten starren dich schweigend an. Du erkennst keinerlei Reue in ihren gestrengen Blicken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The soldiers stare at you silently with stern, judging eyes devoid of any remorse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Soldaten starren dich schweigend an. Du erkennst keinerlei Reue in ihren gestrengen Blicken.{/n}
